Improve all your voice and text conversations!

Optiwe (optiwe.com) is the AI Assistant that helps you get the best out of each conversation. 
Whenever you are talking or chatting in WhatsApp, Facebook, Slack, or any application, Optiwe's AI engine will prompt relevant information and suggest how to create a better impact during your conversation - all in real-time right inside the platforms you are already using.

Empower all your conversations with real-time and intelligent recommendations. 
Avoid talking with any kind of bias, get suggestions about making your conversation more friendly or formal, and have all your knowledge at your fingerprints. 

Sound good? Take a look at optiwe.com and start a free 30-day trial!

★ Use cases:
    - Customer service teams
    - Sales teams
    - Recruiting teams
    - Slack conversations
    - Social network conversations
    - Live chat agents

★ Extension features:
    - Knowledge management embedded in your workflow
    - Contextual knowledge suggestions in text and voice conversations
    - Knowledge search capabilities
    - Real-time conversation sentiment analysis
    - Real-time conversation bias assessment (gender, ethnicity, and age)
    - Conversation style transfer (formal to friendly and friendly to formal) 

★ Where I can use the extension?
    - In any application, you are using.
    - In WhatsApp, Facebook and Slack.
    - In Web Chat applications.
